title: Quit Your Job: A Practical 7 Steps-Plan To Start Your Own Business and Escape the 9 to 5
description: Quitting your day job to embark on another career or start your own business is a huge and frightening step. If you do it, though, you want to make sure you do it right. This book provides a practical plan & great tips for quitting your job and making a successful transition.
author: Can Akdeniz
